name: places/ChIJxdGQpiP2wokRbKhUTQA0P5w
formattedAddress: 926 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 926 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I had the worst experience here yesterday with the Hispanic lady. I went the day before to retrieve just a $ 1000, it went well and I asked if could retrieve another $1000 from the same sender, she told me that the person verifying the SSN should verify mine in order to do that and he was not there. I went back again yesterday, she was the only one there, and she recognized. She yelled right away, that I should have come earlier, I apologized. She continued, very angrily to tell me that she’ll try calling the person who verify the SSN, so I waited. In the meantime she called a friend or a colleague, idk, and in Spanish she was saying that it was suspicious that I wanted to retrieve this amount again while my address is in Newark. When she got on the phone with the SSN verifier, she misunderstood what that person said to him, then turned to like she was accusing me of fraud, and said “he says that the SSN holder is a male. But then she said that she was mistaken. While giving me the money she asked for my address, while fully knowing it I told her, then she went “and you come all the way here for this money?!” I replied that I go to university here on 116th and I work there too. ” As if this was not enough when she asked for my place of birth, and I was telling her exactly so that she won’t be suspicious anymore, she cut me in the middle of my sentence to yell “I just asked for the country!” I genuinely think that my visibly Muslim and African self, led her to have assumptions about me and for her to treat me like a potential criminal, and I was extremely offended about this.

originalText.text: The worst place to do a transfer the Spanish lady is so rude, aggressive, disrespectful, all the time never again. If I could I would give a 0 star.

text.text: The worst place to do a transfer the Spanish lady is so rude, aggressive, disrespectful, all the time never again. If I could I would give a 0 star.

originalText.text: I have no complaints, they were able to send the money I wanted and the wait time was fair.  Just a side note, They close at 9pm, I have no idea why google says that they’re open 24/7

text.text: I have no complaints, they were able to send the money I wanted and the wait time was fair.  Just a side note, They close at 9pm, I have no idea why google says that they’re open 24/7

originalText.text: Bad bad bad service ever. Every time you go to this location you will see a very long line and one person in the window out of 5 windows. They don't care and they're alway impolite.
